data.title: Mrs. Brown's Boys series and episodes list
meta_keywords: TV Mrs. Brown's Boys Series Guide Synopsis Episodes List
data.meta_description: A guide to the 49 episodes across the 4 series of Mrs. Brown's Boys.
data.text:
Mrs. Brown's Boys

TV sitcom

BBC One

2011 - 2024

49 episodes (4 series)

Sitcom adaptation of the popular live stage show starring Brendan O'Carroll as aged housewife Agnes Brown. Also features Derek Reddin, Jennifer Gibney, Paddy Houlihan, Rory Cowan, Pat Shields and more.

Due to return in December 2024

Series 3, Episode 5 repeated Saturday at 12:35am on Gold

Streaming rank this week: 1,063

Series 1 (2011)

The sitcom burst onto BBC One in February 2011. The six-episode first series saw Dermot and Maria getting married.

Christmas Special (2011)

The 2011 Christmas special involved Mrs Brown looking forward to son Trevor coming back from the missions abroad for the first time in four years.

Series 2 (2012)

Dermot and Maria have a baby on the way and are desperate to get away from Mrs Brown's house and get a place of their own.

Christmas 2012 (2012)

Two Christmas specials were broadcast at the end of 2012. It's the busiest ever Christmas for Agnes and the Brown family...

Series 3 (2013)

A six-episode third series, created for 2013, debuted on New Year's Day.

Christmas 2013 (2013)

Another two specials for the 2013 festive period. One for Christmas Day, and one for the build up to the New Year.

Christmas 2014 (2014 - 2015)

Two more specials for Christmas 2014 and New Year 2015.

Christmas 2015 (2015 - 2016)

Two further new specials for Christmas and New Year 2015-16.

Christmas 2017 (2017 - 2018)

Two more episodes. In the first, Grandad thinks the house is haunted. The second sees Agnes and Winnie trying to fight crime.
